metadata.title: CVE-2023-37921 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple arbitrary write vulnerabilities exist in the VCD sorted bsearchfunctionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A specially crafted .vcd file can lead toarbitrary code execution. A victim would need to open a malicious file totrigger these vulnerabilities.This vulnerability concerns the arbitrarywrite when triggered via the vcd2vzt conversion utility.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
